scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.localPeerDependencies // {}) as $L | (.devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.localPeerDependencies // {}) as $L | (.dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
